title: Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And there is a Live Look-in available
And the user is logged in with a paid account
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the Scoreboard page

custom_steps_separated.content: Scoreboard Banner
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then there should be an orange banner under the date bar with the text: 
(example)
Live Look-in
TEX @ COL: Rangers @ Rockies
LIVE

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps anywhere on the banner
EXCEPT for the X
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be taken to the Live Look-in

custom_steps_separated.content: TV EPG button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then there should be an orange indicator on the EPG button

custom_steps_separated.content:
Expanded Game Cell
(when the user expands the SB game cell of the game being looked into)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then there should be a Live Look-in link available
and tapping it will take the user to the LLI

custom_steps_separated.content: Verify banner is closeable
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Tapping the X should close the banner
and the banner should not return for that user
even if they change views and return to the Scoreboard

title: Lite User (Scoreboard)
custom_preconds:
Given there is a Live Look In available
and the user is a LITE user
custom_steps: When the user navs to the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
the LITE user will NOT see any indication of a Live Look-in being available
(no game cell banner; no indicator on MLB.TV EPG button)

title: MLB.TV EPG
custom_preconds: Given there is a Live Look In available

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the MLB.TV EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should see the Live Look-in cell with an Orange Live Look-in indicator on the right in line with the 'Live' indicator of other available games

custom_steps_separated.content: when a paid user taps on the Live Look In cell
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Live Look-in should launch and play without any issue

custom_steps_separated.content: when a lite user taps on the Live Look In cell
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the At Bat paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: When a lite user logs in with a paid account from the At Bat paywall
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Live Look-in should launch and play without issue

title: Team Page
custom_preconds:
Given there is a Live Look In available
and the user is logged in with a paid account

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the Team page for the team associated with the Live Look in
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then there will be a Live Look In button in the main view of the team page

custom_steps_separated.content: when the user taps the Live Look In button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Live Look In should launch and play without any issue

title: Connectivity (Wifi/Carrier)
custom_preconds:
Given the paid user is currently utilizing either a wifi or carrier connection
And there is a Live Look In available
custom_steps: When the user attempts to launch the Live Look In

custom_steps_separated.content: with a wifi connection
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Live Look In launches successfully

custom_steps_separated.content: with a carrier connection
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Live Look In launches successfully

title: Receiving a Phone Call
custom_preconds:
Given there is a Live Look In currently available
And the user has tapped on the Live Look In
custom_steps: When the user receives a Phone Call to the device

custom_steps_separated.content: when the user ignores the phone call
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will successfully ignore the Phone Call
And the Live Look In stream will stop
And the user will be able to resume the Live Look In

custom_steps_separated.content: when the user answers the phone call
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user is successfully able to answer the Phone Call
And the Live Look In stream stops
And when the call is ended, the user will be able to resume the Live Look In

title: Text Message
custom_preconds: Given there is a Live Look In currently available
custom_steps:
When the user has launched the Live Look In
And the user receives a Text Message
custom_expected:
Then the user receives the Text Message successfully
And the user hears the notification sound
And the Live Look In continues to play without interruption

title: Phone Alarm
custom_preconds: Given there is a Live Look In currently available
custom_steps:
When the user launches the Live Look In
And the user has an alarm go off during the Live Look In
custom_expected:
Then the alarm will go off successfully
and the Live Look In will be stopped
and the user will be able to press play after dismissing the alarm

title: MLB.TV Stream
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged in with an entitled MLB.TV account
and there is a Live Look In available
custom_steps:
When the user launches the Live Look In stream
And then hits the stop button immediately on the stream
And then immediately launches an MLB.TV stream
custom_expected: Then the MLB.TV stream starts up successfully

title: Video Highlights
custom_preconds: Given there is currently a Live Look In available
custom_steps:
When the user launches the Live Look In stream
And then hits the 'Stop' button immediately on the stream
And then launches a Video Highlight
custom_expected: Then the Video Highlight starts up successfully

title: Media Player UI
custom_preconds: Given there is a Live Look In available
custom_steps: When the user launches the Live Look In
custom_expected: Then the Media Player UI will behave normally

title: Offline Mode
custom_preconds: Given there is a Live Look In available
custom_steps: When the user loses connection
custom_expected: Then the Live Look In button is no longer accessible

title: Backgrounding the App
custom_preconds: Given there is a Live Look In available
custom_steps:
When the user launches the live look in
And has sent the app to the background
And then has brought the app back into the foreground
custom_expected:
Then the application will return
And the Live Look In stream will resume

title: Audio Stream
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched an Audio Stream
And there is a Live Look In available
custom_steps: When the user launches the Live Look In
custom_expected:
Then the Audio Stream stops playing
And the Live Look In launches successfully

title: Setting
custom_preconds: Given user has At Bat installed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to the app Settings
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see a setting under Homescreen Selection titled "Show Look-in Banners"
and the setting will have an on/off toggle
and it will be defaulted to ON

custom_steps_separated.content: When the Look-in Banner setting is toggled ON
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be able to see Live Look-in banners in the app

custom_steps_separated.content: When the Look-in Banner setting is toggled OFF
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should not see any Live Look-in Banners in the app
but will still be able to see the yellow dot on the TV EPG button

title: Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
Given there is a Live Look-in available
and the user navs to the Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: paid user
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see an orange indicator on the TV EPG button in the top right corner

custom_steps_separated.content: lite user
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will not see an orange indicator on the TV EPG button

title: MLB.TV EPG
custom_preconds: Given there is a Live Look-in available

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the MLB.TV EPG icon in the top right corner
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the MLB.TV EPG should appear
And the user should see the Live Look-in cell and an Orange Live Look-in indicator in line with the other 'Live' game indicators in the MLB.TV index

custom_steps_separated.content: when a paid user taps on the Live Look In cell
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the Live Look-in will launch and play without any issue

custom_steps_separated.content: when a lite user taps on the Live Look In cell
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user will see the At Bat paywall

title: Connectivity (Wifi/Carrier)
custom_preconds:
Given the paid user is currently utilizing either a wifi or carrier connection
And there is a Live Look In available
custom_steps: When the user attempts to launch the Live Look In

custom_steps_separated.content: with a wifi connection
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Live Look In launches successfully

custom_steps_separated.content: with a carrier connection
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Live Look In launches successfully

title: Email Alert
custom_preconds: Given there is a Live Look In available
custom_steps:
When the user has launched the Live Look In
And the user receives an Email with an Alert
custom_expected:
Then the user receives the Email successfully
And the user hears the notification sound
And the Live Look In continues to play without interruption

title: Device Alarm
custom_preconds: Given there is a Live Look In available
custom_steps:
When the user launches the Live Look In
And the user has an alarm go off during the Live Look In
custom_expected:
Then the Live Look In will shutdown
And the alarm goes off successfully
And we will be brought back to the previous location we were inside the application before selecting the Live Look In

title: MLB.TV Stream
custom_preconds:
Given the user is logged into the app with an entitled MLB.TV account
And there is a Live Look In available
custom_steps:
When the user launches the Live Look In stream
And then hits the stop button immediately on the stream
And then immediately launches an MLB.TV stream
custom_expected: Then the MLB.TV stream starts up successfully

title: Video Highlights
custom_preconds: Given there is a Live Look In available
custom_steps:
When the user launches the Live Look In stream
And then hits the 'Stop' button immediately on the stream
And then launches a Video Highlight
custom_expected: Then the Video Highlight starts up successfully

custom_steps: When the user launches the Live Look In
custom_expected: Then the Media Player UI will behave normally

custom_preconds: Given there is a Live Look In available
custom_steps: When the user loses connection
custom_expected: Then the Live Look In button is no longer accesible

custom_preconds: Given there is a Live Look In available
custom_steps:
When the user launches the live look in
And the user has sent the app to the background
And the user has brought the app back into the foreground
custom_expected: Then the Live Look In will resume

Given the user has launched an Audio Stream

Then the Audio Stream stops playing
And the Live Look In launches successfully
